title: Life Expectancy and Population
text:
This page analyzes how life expectancy varies with population size across different countries. Below is a chunk of R code that creates a graph that visualizes this relationship.

library(ggplot2)
gapminder_data <- read.csv("/Users/dafreir/Downloads/gapminder.csv")
ggplot(gapminder_data, aes(x = population_millions, y = life_expectancy, color = continent)) + 
  geom_point() + 
  scale_x_log10() + 
  labs(title = "Life Expectancy vs Population", 
       x = "Population (in millions, log scale)", 
       y = "Life Expectancy")

title: Country Analysis
text:
This page examines the changes in life expectancy, GDP per capita, and population for a specific country over time. For example, letâ€™s analyze Japan. Below is a chunk of R code that creates a graph that visualizes this relationship for Japan.

library(ggplot2)
gapminder_data <- read.csv("/Users/dafreir/Downloads/gapminder.csv")
country_data <- gapminder_data[gapminder_data$country == "Japan", ]
ggplot(country_data, aes(x = year, y = life_expectancy)) + 
  geom_line() + 
  geom_point() + 
  labs(title = "Life Expectancy in Japan over Time", 
       x = "Year", y = "Life Expectancy")







ggplot(country_data, aes(x = year, y = gdp_per_capita)) + 
  geom_line() + 
  geom_point() + 
  labs(title = "GDP per Capita in Japan over Time", 
       x = "Year", y = "GDP per Capita")







ggplot(country_data, aes(x = year, y = population_millions)) + 
  geom_line() + 
  geom_point() + 
  labs(title = "Population in Japan over Time", 
       x = "Year", y = "Population (millions)")

title: Life Expectancy and GDP per Capita
text:
This page explores the relationship between life expectancy and GDP per capita over time for various countries. Below is a chunk of R code that creates a graph that visualizes this relationship.

library(ggplot2)
gapminder_data <- read.csv("/Users/dafreir/Downloads/gapminder.csv")
ggplot(gapminder_data, aes(x = gdp_per_capita, y = life_expectancy, color = continent)) + 
  geom_point() + 
  scale_x_log10() + 
  labs(title = "Life Expectancy vs GDP per Capita", 
       x = "GDP per Capita (log scale)", 
       y = "Life Expectancy")
